description: Patch request schema for updating an existing endpoint.
title: Schema to modify an endpoint with new values.

ip_address.description: IP address on which the endpoint sends/receives flows. IP must be unique in the network.

chassis_id.description: MAC address for the peer network device.

port_id.description: The ifAlias of the peer network device the end point is connected to.

max_bandwidth.description: Maximum bandwidth in kbps that the sender is allowed to send.

role.description: The role of the endpoint as a sender or receiver.
